Projects

Exercise App

This project is an Exercise app where the user can select durationtion and repition workouts such as Running or Push Ups. The app allows them to track their time or reps for the workout.

Quiz App

This project is a Quiz app that let's the user enter quiz questions and then take the quiz to test their knowledge. At the end of the quiz the user can see a summary of what they got correct.

Todo App

This project is a Todo app where users can add task to their list and check them off as they are completed.
